item.description:
Join us as we help Project Smile by selling raffle tickets on Boston Event Guide's summer harbor cruise. This is their first cruise of the summer, so it will be a great crowd! Volunteers will be walking around the boat, selling raffle tickets to cruise guests. Volunteers get free admission on the cruise.

Project Smile is a non profit organization dedicated to helping children involved in traumatic events. For more info on their work, visit www.projectsmile.org

We will meet outside the 7-11 Store at 7:30, cruise departs at 8pm. If you're running late or have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet outside the 7-11 Store at 7:30, cruise departs at 8pm
item.name: Volunteer Opportunity: Help Sell Raffle Tix on Boston Harbor Cruise
